text: [Music]
Brooks Brothers operates 270 stores in
the United States and Canada as well as
having a ecommerce presence we were
originally looking to solve some
challenges relating to speed of
deployment for in u.s. ap implementation
that we were working on since then we
have included all of our production si P
environment into amazon web services
before Amazon chime I think perhaps the
most common way that people communicate
and work together was face-to-face and
with the telephone email was becoming a
bit of a mess
to be honest way too many short
communications taking place in the email
realm and filling up people's inboxes it
became very clear to me that we had an
opportunity to help our end users find a
better way to communicate and so we
decided to evaluate reaching out to the
top tier vendors in the market space we
wanted users on iPhones and iPads
Android devices as well as Windows and
Mac computers to be able to participate
the finalists all went together in the
same day meeting back to back it wasn't
very long into our presentation from the
Amazon Web Services team that it became
very apparent that we had a winner with
Amazon chime Amazon chime has probably
been the easiest deployment that I've
worked on in my 20-plus year IT career
after my first Amazon chime meeting with
our account team but Amazon Web Services
I thought that was easy in a matter of
weeks we had a couple of hundred users
starting to actively use Amazon chime as
their preferred method for holding
meetings we've shortened the amount of
steps that somebody has to go through
when they want to have a conversation
that may involve additional people that
originally anticipated
and also the sharing of content we've
been able to widen the number of people
who are able to attend through the use
of Amazon chime in the past video was
exclusively available if you were in the
correct conference room
and you had to book it and plan it in
advance now as long as one of the
meeting participants has a laptop and
the meeting room has a projector we can
now include other people in the in the
video presence it's just a delight to
have a meeting with Amazon chime we have
no challenges with connecting ourselves
to meetings they start on time nobody is
confused as to who's supposed to be in
the meeting because it has automatic
roll call it's very democratic it's very
global and very accessible today we have
hundreds and hundreds of meetings taking
place every single week with amazon
chimed thousands of minutes of meetings
each month now that amazon chime has
reached a critical mass in deployment
we've been able to start the retiring of
legacy solutions and have one standard
platform for our employees to
communicate across the globe it does
what it's designed what it's advertised
to do and it has become you know
ubiquitous within the company amazon
chime is one of those products that just
works
[Music]
